docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton cannot be in two places at once in the weeks before the first party-nominating contests in Iowa and New Hampshire, but she came close on Tuesday with daughter Chelsea Clinton’s campaign trail debut.

headline.main: Chelsea Clinton Stands Her Mother's Ground in New Hampshire
headline.print_headline: Chelsea Clinton Stands Her Mother's Ground in New Hampshire

docs.snippet: U.S. Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton cannot be in two places at once in the weeks before the first party-nominating contests in Iowa and New Hampshire, but she came close on Tuesday with daughter Chelsea Clinton’s campaign...

headline.main: Chelsea Clinton, Again Her Mother’s Surrogate, Takes Up the Fight Against Bernie Sanders

docs.abstract: In returning to the presidential campaign trail for the first time since 2008, Chelsea Clinton focused on motherhood and attacked Senator Bernie Sanders over his health care and education proposals.
docs.snippet: In returning to the presidential campaign trail for the first time since 2008, Chelsea Clinton focused on motherhood and attacked Senator Bernie Sanders over his health care and education proposals.

docs.lead_paragraph: On his first full day in office, Democratic Gov. John Bel Edwards reversed course from his Republican predecessor Tuesday and started the process of expanding Louisiana's Medicaid program.

headline.main: New Louisiana Governor Starting Medicaid Expansion Plan
headline.print_headline: New Louisiana Governor Starting Medicaid Expansion Plan

docs.snippet: On his first full day in office, Democratic Gov. John Bel Edwards reversed course from his Republican predecessor Tuesday and started the process of expanding Louisiana's Medicaid program.

docs.lead_paragraph: Federal health advisers recommended approval Tuesday for an experimental implant designed to treat patients recovering from heroin and painkiller addiction.

headline.main: FDA Panel Favors Approval for Drug-Oozing Addiction Implant

docs.lead_paragraph: Aetna Inc Chief Executive Mark Bertolini said on Tuesday that he still expects the company's $37 billion acquisition of rival Humana Inc to close this year.

headline.main: Aetna CEO Sees Humana Deal on Track to Close This Year
headline.print_headline: Aetna CEO Sees Humana Deal on Track to Close This Year

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Accuses Bernie Sanders of Not Standing Up to Gun Lobby

docs.abstract: Hillary Clinton, appearing with the president of the Brady Campaign to Prevent Gun Violence, attacked Bernie Sanders on his 2005 vote to shield gunmakers from lawsuits.
docs.snippet: Hillary Clinton, appearing with the president of the Brady Campaign to Prevent Gun Violence, attacked Bernie Sanders on his 2005 vote to shield gunmakers from lawsuits.

docs.lead_paragraph: Facing a narrowing primary contest, Hillary Clinton ripped into rival Bernie Sanders on Tuesday, saying the Vermont senator was offering unrealistic policies and overstating his anti-establishment credentials.

headline.main: With Democratic Race Narrowing, Clinton Rips Into Sanders
headline.print_headline: With Democratic Race Narrowing, Clinton Rips Into Sanders

docs.snippet: Facing a narrowing primary contest, Hillary Clinton ripped into rival Bernie Sanders on Tuesday, saying the Vermont senator was offering unrealistic policies and overstating his anti-establishment credentials.

docs.lead_paragraph: Mammograms do the most good later in life, a government task force has declared in recommending that women get one every other year starting at age 50. It said 40-somethings should make their own choice after weighing the pros and cons.

headline.main: Task Force: Mammograms an Option at 40, Do More Good at 50
headline.print_headline: Task Force: Mammograms an Option at 40, Do More Good at 50

docs.snippet: Mammograms do the most good later in life, a government task force has declared in recommending that women get one every other year starting at age 50. It said 40-somethings should make their own choice after weighing the pros and cons.

docs.abstract: What have been the defining aspects of Obama's legacy as president?
docs.snippet: What have been the defining aspects of Obama's legacy as president?

docs.lead_paragraph: Gov. Matt Bevin has formally notified the Obama administration that he plans to “wind down and cease operation” of the state’s health insurance exchange.

headline.main: Kentucky: Notice Served on Closing of Health Site
headline.print_headline: Kentucky: Notice Served on Closing of Health Site

docs.abstract: Kentucky Gov Matt Bevin, who opposes Affordable Care Act, tells Obama administration he plans to direct residents to federal health insurance exchange and dissolve state's exchange Kynect, move his predecessor claims will cost state at least $23 million.
docs.snippet: Gov. Matt Bevin has formally notified the Obama administration that he plans to “wind down and cease operation” of the state’s health insurance exchange.
